items.sentence: I stopped caring about what Tom thinks a long time ago.
I think Tom and Mary are going to be so happy together.
I think Tom can speak French. I could be wrong, though.
Yesterday, Tom told me that he\'d never been to Boston.
You can\'t keep Tom from doing whatever he wants to do.
According to the paper, there was a big fire in Boston.
I can\'t afford to eat in such an expensive restaurant.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time arguing with Tom.
Tom finally realized that Mary didn\'t really like him.
Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
Tickets are available for free at the information desk.
Tom Jackson became famous when he was still a teenager.
Tom almost never makes mistakes when writing in French.
Tom always feels hungry at least one hour before lunch.
Tom always said he wanted to learn how to play mahjong.
They held Tom for a few hours and then let him go free.
This dictionary is very expensive, but is worth buying.
This work is simple enough that even a child can do it.
When I was a child, I played with my friends every day.
Which do you want first, the good news or the bad news?
